data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Raphael Holzhauser puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 17, Tarik Tissoudali scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
Raphael Holzhauser instrumental with a fine assist.
Penalty! Jan Boterberg points to the spot, great chance for Beerschot...
In the minute 25, Raphael Holzhauser gives Beerschot a 3-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Beerschot take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Tarik Tissoudali.
That's a fine assist from Loris Brogno.
In the minute 40, Goal! Loris Brogno extends Beerschot's lead to 5-0.
Great play from Frederic Frans to set up the goal.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 5-1 through a strike by Oleksandr Filippov. .
In the minute 44, Santiago Colombatto with an assist there.
The first-half has come to a close in Antwerp.
The second-half is underway at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 49, Goal! Yuma Suzuki pulls one back to make it 5-2.
It's now 6-2 in Antwerp as Ismaila Coulibaly scores for Beerschot.
The away team have replaced Pol Garcia with Chris Durkin. This is the first substitution made today by Kevin Muscat.
In the minute 62, Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Duckens Nazon replacing Seung-Woo Lee.
Samuel Asamoah (St. Truidense) gets a yellow card.
Dario Van Den Buijs is replacing Mohamed Halaimia for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 69, Hernan Losada is making the team's second substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Abdoulie Sanyang replacing Yan Vorogovskiy.
Duckens Nazon puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 6-3.
Hernan Losada is making the team's third substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Mukuna replacing Tarik Tissoudali.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Oleksandr Filippov with Facundo Colidio. This is the third substitution made today by Kevin Muscat.
Maximiliano Caufriez is booked for the away team.
At Olympisch Stadion, Ibrahima Sory Sankhon has been yellow-carded for the away team.
